    XPEL Authorized Dealer

    We carry the full XPEL product line — Ultimate Plus™ PPF, Fusion Plus™ Ceramic Coating, and Prime XR Plus™ Ceramic Tint — backed by the world's most trusted automotive protection brand.

    XPEL Certified Installers

    Every installation is performed by factory-trained, XPEL-certified technicians who meet the highest standards for precision, technique, and quality control.

    Exotic & Luxury Specialists

    From Ferraris and Lamborghinis to Rolls-Royces and Bentleys — we specialize in high-value vehicles that demand the highest level of care and craftsmanship.

    7+ Years of Excellence

    With over seven years of hands-on experience and 500+ vehicles protected, we've built a reputation that Miami's most discerning car owners trust.

    Climate-Controlled Facility

    Our purpose-built installation bay maintains optimal temperature and humidity levels — critical for flawless film adhesion and curing in Miami's tropical climate.

    Industry-Leading Warranties

    10-year warranty on PPF, 5-year warranty on ceramic coatings, and lifetime warranty on ceramic tints. Your investment is protected for the long haul.

    BUYER BEWARE

    Not All Shops Are Created Equal

    Miami is full of "PPF guys" working out of garages with no certifications and no warranties. Here's what's really at stake when you choose the wrong installer.

    The Average Shop

    Uncertified installers using cheap, off-brand film

    No manufacturer warranty — you're on your own

    Garage or outdoor installs with dust contamination

    Poor edge work that lifts, peels, and yellows within months

    No paint correction — imperfections sealed under film

    Zero accountability when things go wrong

    Bespoke Auto Design

    XPEL-certified installers with 500+ documented installs

    Full manufacturer warranties — up to 10 years on PPF

    Climate-controlled facility built for flawless adhesion

    Precision DAP-cut templates — zero guesswork

    Multi-stage paint correction before every coating

    Direct XPEL support & annual maintenance inspections

    Your vehicle deserves more than a gamble. Get it done right the first time — by Miami's most trusted certified installers.
